Title: Spies Like Us
Writer: Dan Aykroyd (story), Dave Thomas (story), Dan Aykroyd (screenplay), Lowell Ganz (screenplay), Babaloo Mandel (screenplay)
Actors: Mark Stewart, Sean Daniel, Bruce Davison, William Prince
Plot: Two low-level government employees, Emmitt Fitz-Hume (played by Chevy Chase) and Austin Milbarge (Dan Aykroyd), are chosen for a top-secret CIA mission. They are unsuitable as CIA agents but are deliberately chosen for this reason, as their mission is a decoy one and they are expendable. After being fast-tracked through training they are parachuted into Pakistan where all manner of adventures await them.
